SELECT c.* , ( SELECT COUNT(cr.id) FROM moka.commentrelation cr WHERE 1 = 1 AND cr.commentId = c.id AND cr.userId = #{userId} AND cr.comType = 1 AND cr.type = 3) AS isPraised, ( SELECT COUNT(cr.id) FROM moka.commentrelation cr WHERE 1 = 1 AND cr.commentId = c.id AND cr.userId = #{userId} AND cr.comType = 3 AND cr.type = 3) AS isForward FROM moka.comment c WHERE
1 = 2
c.lineId = #{lineId} AND c.type = 1
c.lineSendId = #{lineSendId} AND c.type = 2
c.branchId = #{branchId} AND c.type = 3
LIMIT #{pageStart} , #{pageSize};

update.if: UPDATE moka.comment SET comment.praised = comment.praised - 1 WHERE comment.id = #{id};
